document.full_text: a u.s. nuclear plant in alabama similar in design to the earthquake-hit fukushima facility in japan has multiple defenses to prevent and tackle the same kind of emergency, its operator said.
document.title: u.s. nuclear plant says shielded against japan emergency
lines_and_colors: a u.s. nuclear plant in alabama similar in design to the earthquake-hit fukushima facility in japan has multiple defenses to prevent and tackle the same kind of emergency, its operator said.
